answerText: Athol Fugard[10] This South African author was the editor of Ian Fleming's James Bond novels. In addition to being the dedicatee of Goldfinger, he was the librettist of Benjamin Britten's Gloriana.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 5 | 9 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Name these African authors who all have white skin. [10] A pair of brothers named Morris and Zachariah feud while living in Port Elizabeth in this author's play Blood Knot. As a novelist, he wrote Tsotsi, though that was eventually turned into a film.
